                                                                           OperationHistoryObjectId operationId)

        Returns balance operation on the account and operation id.

        Parameters:
        accountId - object id of the account whose history should be queried, 1.2.*
        operationId - object id of the history object, 1.7.*
        Returns:
        an balance operation change

      • listOperations

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> listOperations(AccountObjectId accountId,
                                                          OperationHistoryObjectId startId,
                                                          OperationHistoryObjectId stopId,
                                                          int limit)

        Get account history of operations.

        Parameters:
        accountId - object id of the account whose history should be queried, 1.2.*
        limit - number of entries, max 100
        startId - id of the history object to start from
        stopId - id of the history object to stop at
        Returns:
        a list of operations performed by account, ordered from most recent to oldest

      • listOperationsRelative

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> listOperationsRelative(AccountObjectId accountId,
                                                                  int start,
                                                                  int limit)

        Get account history of operations.

        Parameters:
        accountId - object id of the account whose history should be queried, 1.2.*
        start - sequence number of the most recent operation to retrieve. 0 is default, which will start querying from the most recent operation
        limit - maximum number of operations to retrieve (must not exceed 100)
        Returns:
        a list of operations performed by account, ordered from most recent to oldest

      • findAllOperations

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> findAllOperations(AccountObjectId accountId,
                                                             java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.model.AssetObjectId> assets,
                                                             AccountObjectId recipientAccount,
                                                             long fromBlock,
                                                             long toBlock,
                                                             long startOffset,
                                                             int limit)

        Returns the most recent balance operations on the named account. This returns a list of operation history objects, which describe activity on the account.

        Parameters:
        accountId - object id of the account whose history should be queried, 1.2.*
        assets - list of asset object ids to filter or empty for all assets
        recipientAccount - partner account object id to filter transfers to specific account, 1.2.* or null
        fromBlock - filtering parameter, starting block number (can be determined from time) or zero when not used
        toBlock - filtering parameter, ending block number or zero when not used
        startOffset - starting offset from zero
        limit - the number of entries to return (starting from the most recent), max 100
        Returns:
        a list of balance changes

      • findAllOperations

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> findAllOperations(AccountObjectId accountId,
                                                             java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.model.AssetObjectId> assets,
                                                             AccountObjectId recipientAccount,
                                                             long fromBlock,
                                                             long toBlock,
                                                             long startOffset)

        Returns the most recent balance operations on the named account. This returns a list of operation history objects, which describe activity on the account.

        Parameters:
        accountId - object id of the account whose history should be queried, 1.2.*
        assets - list of asset object ids to filter or empty for all assets
        recipientAccount - partner account object id to filter transfers to specific account, 1.2.* or null
        fromBlock - filtering parameter, starting block number (can be determined from time) or zero when not used
        toBlock - filtering parameter, ending block number or zero when not used
        startOffset - starting offset from zero
        Returns:
        a list of balance changes
